resources.string: You are in your Normal Weight

Increase the consumption of complex carbohydrates (carbohydrates). They are basically the foods in integral form, as integral bread, oats, Muesli and brown rice. Without forgetting the vegetables and fruits.

Continue to monitor your weight, control your stress Because it can be a cause of tension, changes in the heart and increased levels of triglycerides. Avoid drinking alcohol because alcoholic beverages and tobacco.

Go to a professional dietitian-nutritionist. Will inform you Of your ideal weight and goal to reach according to your personal characteristics. It is important that you go to the scheduled control visits, which will allow Not only modify the contents of the diet when necessary, but also Will serve as support, nutritionally educate, etc.
